threat: An attacker could exploit this to generate and display arbitrary URLs to users.
An attacker could use this flaw to cause Django to consume memory, resulting in a denial of service.
An attacker could use this flaw to perform entity-expansion and external-entity/DTD attacks.
special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
